Test.Name: Correct response

Test.TestName: SCHEDULE-2-1-5-v15.06 GET SCHEDULE INFO WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: Correct response (empty access profiles list)
Test.Description: 8. If scheduleInfoCompleteList is empty, skip other steps.

Test.TestName: SCHEDULE-2-1-5-v15.06 GET SCHEDULE INFO WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: Correct response (MaxLimit = 1)
Test.Description: 10. If cap.MaxLimit less than 2, skip other steps.

Test.TestName: SCHEDULE-2-1-5-v15.06 GET SCHEDULE INFO WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: Invalid response: second GetScheduleInfo (wrong token)
Test.Description: 15. If scheduleInfoList[0].token does not equal to scheduleInfoCompleteList[0].token, FAIL the test.

Test.TestName: SCHEDULE-2-1-5-v15.06 GET SCHEDULE INFO WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: Invalid response: second GetScheduleInfo (wrong items number)
Test.Description: 14. If scheduleInfoList contains more than one item, FAIL the test.

Test.TestName: SCHEDULE-2-1-5-v15.06 GET SCHEDULE INFO WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: Invalid response: second GetScheduleInfo (empty list)
Test.Description: 13. If scheduleInfoList is empty, FAIL the test.

Test.TestName: SCHEDULE-2-1-5-v15.06 GET SCHEDULE INFO WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: Invalid response: first GetScheduleInfo (not empty list)
Test.Description: 7. If scheduleInfoList is not empty, FAIL the test.
